name: ignore
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to intentionally not listen or give attention to

example.eg: She can be really irritating but I try to ignore her.
example.egtrans: 她有时会特别烦人，不过我尽量不去理会她。

example.eg: Safety regulations are being ignored by company managers in the drive to increase profits.
example.egtrans: 为了增加利润，公司经理们对安全章程熟视无睹。

example.eg: How can the government ignore the wishes of the majority?
example.egtrans: 政府怎么能不顾大多数人的意愿呢？

example.eg: I smiled at her but she just ignored me.
example.egtrans: 我对她笑了笑，可她根本没理睬我。
